content: northern snowflake this pattern is copyright © jackie tyler karp 1998/99/2000-21 do not post on other web sites crochet groups etc or copy illegally it is free for personal use only size - roughly 4 5 inches across materials size 10 thread - i used southmaid white with filament 1 5mm hook or size that you normally use for this weight of thread instructions to do picot - ch5 slip_stitch in top of same st ch6 join round 1 12sc in ring slip_stitch to join round 2 ch5 counts as double_crochet ch2 double_crochet ch2 in each st around slip_stitch to join 12 double_crochet round 3 ch1 single_crochet in same st ch5 single_crochet in next double_crochet picot ch5 single_crochet in next double_crochet 6 times slip_stitch to join round 4 slip_stitch centre of first ch5 loop single_crochet in loop ch12 slip_stitch in 7th chain from hook ch5 skip picot single_crochet in next ch5 loop chain 3 single_crochet in next loop 6 times but replace the last ch3 and single_crochet with ch1 double_crochet to join round 5 ch1 single_crochet in loop picot ch8 skip next chain 5 and single_crochet in ch7 loop picot single_crochet ch8 skip next ch5 and single_crochet in ch3 loop 6 times replacing last single_crochet with a slip_stitch in base of first picot finish off block and stiffen in the normal way copyright © jackie tyler karp 1998/99/2000-21
